SEARCH
Package rayrangers.raytracer.math

Class Matrix3x3

java.lang.Object
rayrangers.raytracer.math.Matrix3x3
public class Matrix3x3 extends Object
Represents a 3x3 transformation matrix.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Matrix3x3()
    Default constructor initializes the matrix as an identity matrix.

    Constructor to initialize a 3x3 matrix.

    • rotationZ

      public static Matrix3x3 rotationZ(double phi)
      Rotation around the x3-axis (z-axis). Matrix: [ cos(φ) -sin(φ) 0 ] [ sin(φ) cos(φ) 0 ] [ 0 0 1 ]
      Parameters:
      phi - The rotation angle in radians.
      Returns:
      A new Matrix3x3 instance representing the rotation.

    • rotationX

      public static Matrix3x3 rotationX(double phi)
      Rotation around the x1-axis (x-axis). Matrix: [ 1 0 0 ] [ 0 cos(φ) -sin(φ) ] [ 0 sin(φ) cos(φ) ]
      Parameters:
      phi - The rotation angle in radians.
      Returns:
      A new Matrix3x3 instance representing the rotation.

    • rotationY

      public static Matrix3x3 rotationY(double phi)
      Rotation around the x2-axis (y-axis). Matrix: [ cos(φ) 0 sin(φ) ] [ 0 1 0 ] [ -sin(φ) 0 cos(φ) ]
      Parameters:
      phi - The rotation angle in radians.
      Returns:
      A new Matrix3x3 instance representing the rotation.
